jasmine.regression.LinearRegression

class jasmine.regression.LinearRegression(use_bias=True, learning_rate=0.01, n_epochs=1000, loss_function=<function mean_squared_error>, l1_penalty=0.0, l2_penalty=0.0)[source]
__init__(use_bias=True, learning_rate=0.01, n_epochs=1000, loss_function=<function mean_squared_error>, l1_penalty=0.0, l2_penalty=0.0)[source]
init_params(n_features, key=None)[source]

Initialize model parameters.

Parameters:

  • n_features (int) – Number of features in the input data.

  • key (jax.random.PRNGKey, optional) – Random key for parameter initialization.

Forward pass for the linear model.

Parameters:

  • params (dict) – Model parameters

  • X (jnp.ndarray) – Input features

Returns:

Predicted values

Compute the loss for the linear model.

Parameters:

  • X (jnp.ndarray) – Input features

  • y (jnp.ndarray) – Target values

Train the linear regression model using gradient descent.

  • y (jnp.ndarray) – Target values
